FuncDef: The reset cpu-defend ma-defend statistics command clears information about management plane protection on the interface board.

ParaDef.Info:
Specifies the slot ID of an interface board.
-

ExtraInfo:
Usage Scenario
To clear information about management plane protection on the interface board, run the reset cpu-defend ma-defend statistics command.
Information about management plane protection cannot be restored after being cleared. Exercise caution when running the command.
Precautions
In VS mode, this command is supported only by the admin VS.
